name: Deuter Race EXP Air Daypack - Unisex
description: A sleek, compact pack for fast and light days on the bike. Its smart design expands to accommodate extra gear and the flexible frame adapts to different adventures.Aircomfort FlexLite back system with airy mesh to reduce perspiration.Mesh shoulder straps and mesh hip fins reduce weight and increase breathability.Stowable helmet holder.Front pocket with zipped valuables pocket.Compartment for wet or sweaty clothes.Mesh side pockets.3M reflectors at front, sides, and back for increased visibility.Includes a rain cover.Loop for bike light.Hydration compatible holds up to a 3L water reservoir (sold separately).Top zipper expands pack to increase volume by 3L.
